EventsOfInterest.Title: CESTA Presents: Data Visualization with Tableau – June 28

ProjectUpdatesAndNews.Title: Welcome to the new CESTA Blog!
A Decade of Fire in Western Australia
ProjectUpdatesAndNews.Content: The Spatial History Project’s A Decade of Fire in Western Australia has received a significant visualization update.
ProjectUpdatesAndNews.ProjectDescription: This application is based on a combination of ethnographic and ecological research undertaken by Stanford faculty and students in collaboration with Martu, Aboriginal owners of an expansive Native Title located in the Great and Little Sandy Desert bioregions of Western Australia.
